name: bandcamp-tuned
description: Browser extension that enhances the Bandcamp listening experience
author: Rafal Enden

scripts.build:zip: zip -r dist/bandcamp-tuned.zip manifest.json src/ vendor/ icons/
scripts.build:safari: mkdir -p dist/build && xcodebuild -project "xcode/Bandcamp Tuned.xcodeproj" -scheme "Bandcamp Tuned (macOS)" -configuration Release -derivedDataPath dist/safari build
scripts.build: npm run build:zip && npm run build:safari
